attributes.action: Make school days shorter for all schools
attributes.additional_details: Shorten the school day so that we are awake and actually learn and so we dont get exausted and not pick up what we are learning as school physically drains us all and ruins our mental health the hours are too long and make us physically and mentally not want to go as it is draining us
attributes.background: I want the school days to be shortened as it is scientifically proven teenagers brains dont wake up fully untill 10 am and school mentally drains us. We all agree the hours are too long.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We understand that you want to see school days shortened, but the length of the school day varies from school to school, and it is not clear what length you want school days to be limited to.

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

We have published the following petition, which you might like to sign:

Start school at 10am to help teenagers with tiredness: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/612113
